msbt.message: So this is a horseshoe crab Doesn't look much like a crab or a shoe.You know, sometimes keeping up with the fashion industry feels like a full-time job.
I don't know what I expected a sea pineapple to look likebut it wasn't this.
Imagine deejaying a party with those giant lobster claws.What you'd lose in sound quality you'd make up for in notoriety. And that's way more important.
So this is the biggest clam in the world, eh? The gigas giant clam.Yeah, if you get stuck in one of these, I don't think you're ever getting out, .
I never thought I'd say this, but that umbrella octopus is so cute.Bravo, my tiny mollusk friend, . Bravo!
Given its name, I'm guessing that the red king crab is kind of, like, the head honcho of the crab world. I can see why Those claws look pretty sharp.
Ah, the moon jellyfish. Breathtakingly beautifuland highly venomous.Much like every rose has its thorns, every jelly has its sting.
The chambered nautilus's shell is so intricately detailed It's almost hypnotic, Is anyone else getting sleepy
With legs like those, the spider crab could truly rule the runway.As an aspiring model and global brand ambassador, maybe I could give 'em some helpful tips.
This giant isopod stays pretty big considering it lives in an environment with so little food. Suspicious What else are you hiding from us, giant isopod?
Actually, I'm glad we ran into each other here. I wanted to thank you for your donation to the museum. It's made me appreciateand fear the ocean in a whole new way.
